description: He showed faultless intonation, a gorgeous big tone and rich vibrato in his playing. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Concert review: Violinist Paul Huang is a rising star in classical music
title_page: Concert review: Violinist Paul Huang is a rising star in classical music | The Straits Times
